name: Back to Nature
description:
Go back to a simple time, go back to a harsher time, go back to Nature.


Controls:
LMB - Select and Interact


How To Play:
If Red (Energy), Blue (Thirst) or Green (Hunger) bars drop to zero a chacter will die.

Chop wood to burn at the camp site.
Collect food to cook on the fire.
Drink from the local stream.
Rest at your tent.

See how long your 3 survivors can last when alone in the wilderness.

Credits:
Music
